thread.title: BRIEF-Offer Purchase Price Of 23 Zlotys/Shr Does Not Reflect Fair Value Of AAT Holding - Funds

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Offer Purchase Price Of 23 Zlotys/Shr Does Not Reflect Fair Value Of AAT Holding - Funds
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - AAT HOLDING SA:
* SHAREHOLDERS SAY THAT PURCHASE PRICE OF 23 ZLOTYS PER SHARE IN OFFER DOES NOT REFLECT COâ€˜S FAIR VALUE
* AMONG SHAREHOLDERS ARE: NATIONALE-NEDERLANDEN OFE, AVIVA OFE, AEGON OFE, FAMILIAR SA SICAV-SIF (FUNDS)
* CO ANNOUNCED ITS SHARE BUYBACK PLAN OF UP TO 2.4 MILLION OWN SHARES OFFERING 23 ZLOTYS PER SHARE ON FEB. 20 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
